Spells:
Aid (C2 Abju): R30' 3 targets gain +5 temporary HP for 8 hr [+Level gives +5 temporary HP]
Arcane Eye (C4 [Arcana Domain] Divi): R30' Self sees w/darkvision through a remote invisible eye that moves 30'/rd for conc up to 1 hr
Astral Projection (C9 Necr): R10' Self and 8 willing targets project to astral plane
Bane (C1 Ench): R30' 3 targets suffer -1d4 on attacks and saving throws (Charisma neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Conjure Celestial (C7 Conj): R90' Summons an obedient CR 4 celestial for conc, 1 hr, or until slain [+Level summons CR 5 at level 9]
Create Food And Water (C3 Conj): R30' Creates 45 lb of food and 30 gallons of water
Cure Wounds (C1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+4 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Death Ward (C4 Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP for 8 hrs
Detect Evil And Good (C1 Divi): R30' Self senses aberrations, celestials, elementals, feys, fiends, undead, consecration, and desecration for conc up to 10 min
Detect Magic (C1 Divi): R30' Self senses magic auras for conc up to 10 min [R]
Detect Magic (C1 [Arcana Domain] Divi): R30' Self senses magic auras for conc up to 10 min [R]
Dispel Magic (C3 [Arcana Domain] Abju): R120' Ends the effects of a spell up to level 3; successful DC 10 + spell level ends a higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Divination (C4 Divi): Self gains truthful answer about an event up to 7 dy in the future [R]
Earthquake (C8 Evoc): R500' 100' radius opens fissures, damages structures, breaks concentration (Constitution neg), and knocks prone (Dexterity neg) for conc up to 1 min
Find Traps (C2 Divi): R120' Self senses the presence of traps
Flame Strike (C5 Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire and 4d6 HP radiant (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP choice of fire or radiant]
Guardian Of Faith (C4 Conj): R30' 10' radius inflicts 20 HP radiant to hostile creatures (Dexterity half) for 8 hr or 60 HP
Guidance (C0 Divi): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 ability check w/in conc up to 1 min
Hallow (C5 Evoc): 60' radius becomes warded against celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead and their effects and evokes a boon effect
Heroes' Feast (C6 Conj): R30' 12 diners recover from disease and poison and gain immunity to poison and fright, Adv on Wisdom, and +2d10 HP and maximum HP for 1 dy
Hold Person (C2 Ench): R60' Immobilizes target humanoid (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Legend Lore (C5 Divi): Self learns info about a specified person, place, or object
Leomund's Secret Chest (C4 [Arcana Domain] Conj): Self may move a touched 12' cube chest to and from the Ethereal Plane for 60+ days
Light (C0 Evoc): Touched object lights a 20' radius (Dexterity neg) for 1 hr
Magic Circle (C3 [Arcana Domain] Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents choice of entry or exit (Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts Disadv on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by choice of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead for 1 hr [+Level extends duration +1 hr]
Magic Missile (C1 [Arcana Domain] Evoc): R120' 3 darts inflict 1d4+1 HP force each [+Level creates +1 dart]
Magic Weapon (C2 [Arcana Domain] Tran): Gives touched weapon a +1 magic bonus for conc up to 1 hr [+Level gives +2/+3 bonus at level 4/6]
Mass Healing Word (C3 Evoc): R60' 6 targets regain 1d4+4 HP [+Level restores +1d4 HP]
Mending (C0 Tran): Touch repairs a small break or tear
Nystul's Magic Aura (C2 [Arcana Domain] Illu): Divinations on willing target report false information for 1 dy
Planar Ally (C6 Conj): R60' Self may bargain for service from an otherworldly entity
Planar Binding (C5 [Arcana Domain] Abju): R60' Binds a celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend to service (Charisma neg) for 1 dy [+Level extends duration to 10/30/180/366 dy at level 6/7/8/9]
Regenerate (C7 Tran): Touched regains 4d8+15 HP and 1 HP/rd for 1 hr and reattaches or regrows severed parts
Sacred Flame (C0 Evoc): R60' Target suffers 4d8 HP radiant (Dexterity neg)
Teleportation Circle (C5 [Arcana Domain] Conj): R10' Creates a portal that provides access to similar circles for 1 rd
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects for 1 min
Tongues (C3 Divi): Touched understands any language and is universally understood for 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Druid): Knows 2 D0 spells/May cast chosen D1 spell 1/long rest
Arcane Initiate: Knows two W0 cantrips
Arcane Mastery: May add 1 each W6, W7, W8, and W9 spells as domain spells
Divine Intervention: 100% chance to gain help from deity 1/wk
Elemental Adept (Acid): Acid spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Lightning): Lightning spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Potent Spellcasting: +4 Cleric cantrip damage
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Spell Breaker: Casting a healing spell also dispels a spell of equal or lesser level affecting target
